attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 2006, by democratic vote, Bedfordshire County Council decided to retain Middle Schools. The new Unitary Authorities of Bedford Borough and of Mid-Bedfordshire, are threatening once more to throw the education of our children into disarray by closing our excellent Middle Schools.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "save Bedfordshire's Middle Schools."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21687


Prime Minister's Office
